home.heading: Managing your orders has never been so easy
home.value: Prepare, manage and ship your Shop orders from a single dashboard, independent form the courrier.

features.heading: Integral Solution
features.uniqueUiExplanation: A single interface to manage your orders, including shipments, changes and returns.
features.tariffsExplanation: Order Management Time will decrease from minutes to seconds, so you can dedicate ressources to sell more.
features.trackingExplanation: Generate reports of managed orders and track them proactively.

levelUp.heading: Focus on what's important
levelUp.explanation: Manage from Cangopal your sales orders, your massive shipments campaigns and your warehouse distribution to focus on what really matters: your business growth.

manualWork.heading: No more manual work
manualWork.explanation: Each carrier has a different system? No problem: Cangopal supports them all, without installing plugins or coding.

integrations.heading: We integrate anything
integrations.explanation: More than 15 different carriers and logistic operators in one click

customerSuccess.heading: We are here for you
customerSuccess.explanation: Our Support Team is always available so your shipments never stop.
customerSuccess.supportTeam: Our Support Team is helping you during your first steps and any time you need them.

growth.heading: We grow together
growth.explanation: Optimize your ressources if you're small and indsutrialize or externalize if your big. That easy.
